extendedInfo.description: Throw Em Balls brings you the latest in addictive gameplay and realistic graphics, the idea is simple yet it boosts such a challenging gameplay setup. Play your favourite sports whilst trying to get the best high score in the world, reckon you could be number 1??*Features*â 5 Levelsâ 5 Sportsâ Realistic Physics Engineâ Unique Scoring Systemâ Stunning Graphicsâ Leaderboards*What's Next*â More Levelsâ More Sportsâ More FUN!!*Support*If you have any issues or suggestions for our App on your device please don't rate us poorly, we welcome all feedback and aim to get all problems fixed. Please contact us on info@throwemballs.co.uk if you have any problems.

reviews.title: Physics suck
reviews.comment: Balls seem to play with the gravity and \"realistic physics\" a little too UN realistic. Also score for unlocking level2 is 15000 yet level three unlocks with only 10000 little strange.
reviews.author: Sandy Strachan

reviews.title: Very playable little game
reviews.comment: Concept is simple, physics are fine.  In reply to a previous comment, the score to unlock level 3 is lower than to unlock 2 because level 2 is significantly harder to score on than 1! With practise I got better, but a practise area of the game to get used to the physics would be good :)
reviews.author: Jacob Saunders

reviews.title: Fun for 5 minutes, would not pay for a game of this quality.
reviews.comment: Physics are unrealistic and the hoops or holes are far too small and easily bounce the balls out again, poor game.
reviews.author: John McIntosh

reviews.title: The problem of this game.
reviews.comment: It\'s not fun, not really because the physics is off like other comments said, it\'s because it\'s so hard to practise and get better at it. the ball appears at absolutely random position so you never really get used to the physics. How is it challenging if you can\'t learn to play better? and how is it fun if it\'s not challenging?
reviews.author: Shawn Zhang

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: Fun but, it\'s way too hard to get the ball in the net in basketball. The ball bounces way too much off the backboard.
reviews.author: Daryle Henry

reviews.title: Its fun at first, but not for long.
reviews.comment: I have a few issues with this game. The degree of dificulty on some of the later levels is nuts. Eventually I beat football by luck, but with Golf it seems every other ball bounces out of the goal, and I need 30,000 to unlock the next level...  Also annoying is highscores seem to change themselves whenever yhey want. I could get 15, 000 on a level, then in a round or two I could be back down to 6000 or something as a high score.
reviews.author: RJ Korvemaker

reviews.title: Unreal
reviews.comment: Wow, this game is unreal ;-) Dont listen to the moaners, this is a fun game. Bet none of you can shoot a hoop in reality either...
reviews.author: Andrew Bell

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: The game is great sure some levels could do with bigger holes (golf level) but that won\'t stop me playing
reviews.author: Aaron Keay

reviews.title: what\'s all the bad coments for????
reviews.comment: this app is amazing. I used to play real basketball but I find this app way better it has to be featured by the the Google staff. I feel sorry for the people/person who made this app who has to deal with all the bad comments. by the way dean could you make. the ball bounce abit less from the nets backboard.thanks ;)
reviews.author: Imran Askri

reviews.title: Love it but
reviews.comment: Can\'t get more than 18000 on level three arghhh.
reviews.author: Doug Finlay

reviews.title: lame
reviews.comment: this game aint fun, what a stupid bore.
reviews.author: Lovac Lennard

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: You only can do one place
reviews.author: Bradley Green

reviews.title: Reset all achieved levels
reviews.comment: Its been 4-5 times that I passed up to soccer level. From now and then, it resets the level back and I have to unlock them all over again. Other than that its a great game.
reviews.author: Michel Chau

reviews.comment: No instructions, gotta guess how to unlock other games/levels...
reviews.author: Rose Wilmott

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: Pretty fun game, but will freeze at the end of every 3 or so games and needs to be exited and relaunched.
reviews.author: Brian Pellett

reviews.title: No move to sd card
reviews.comment: Make a move to sd card option
reviews.author: Adam Pladgeman

reviews.title: Well then.
reviews.comment: You call this \"realistic\"? How about you name the game \"Sports on the Moon\", then we can talk about realism.
reviews.author: Jacob Becker

reviews.title: Holes too small.
reviews.comment: The tiny holes and unrealistic physics, as well as the ceiling, all make it frustrating rather than fun.  It looks decent though. Tweak the physics and make the holes a little bigger to improve. The score thresholds can always be upped if it\'s too easy. Could be a winner!
reviews.author: James Wilson

reviews.title: Unrealistic
reviews.comment: Realistic physics engine? It\'s like I\'m playing the game on the moon! Because of this, if I play basketball I can\'t hit the ball of the backboard for it to go in. I have to either hit it off the top of the screen or get it to go straight in which is really hard and not fun.
reviews.author: David Methven

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: One of the worst games I\'ve played in regard to accuracy and precision. Inaccurate gravity combine with poor aim modifiers and completely unrealistic rebound makes this game feel like a carnival game rather than a test of accuracy and precision. Regardless of positioning and consistent aiming, the ball will always fire at a random velocity turning it into a game of chance. Delete delete delete.
reviews.author: Ruhv S
